channel.title: Client closes after i walk around/do stuff
channel.description: I start up the server, then the client.. I log in.. I can stand in one spot and spawn items and what not, but when i walk around or do something the client window just closes. :(

item.title: Client closes after i walk around/do stuff
item.dc:creator: @zirgriz zirgriz
item.description:
@zirgriz wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:3, topic:359461”][quote author=mossep link=topic=455914.msg3337932#msg3337932 date=1284115884]
http://download.cnet.com/Bat-To-Exe-Converter/3000-2069_4-10555897.html - Use on client and run .exe file. Enjoy.
[/quote]
… Fucking retarded people in this community, i swear.
If you’re using Windows 7/Vista 64 bit, then that’s the reason.
Set your variables/classpath, or use “C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe”[/quote]

i’ve tried this before and all i get is an error that pops up saying “Windows cannot find ‘Xmx500m’, make sure you typed the name correctly and try again.”
Yes i have windows 7. Can you tell me what is wrong with this??

@echo off
start “C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

the original is
@echo off
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Read full topic
item.source: Client closes after i walk around/do stuff

[/quote]
… Fucking retarded people in this community, i swear.
If you’re using Windows 7/Vista 64 bit, then that’s the reason.
Set your variables/classpath, or use “C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe”[/quote]

Or just do as I did. I have windows 7 64bit…

Read full topic
